name: test_NAF_9_8_0_Edit_Program
description:
Test that an admin user can create and edit programs.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Programs section
4. Create a new program with random title
5. Wait for page to load after program creation
6. Edit the created program
7. Verify changes are saved successfully

@allure.feature("9.0.0 Programs Management")
    @allure.epic("Web CMS Testing")
    @allure.story("9.8.0 Create/Edit Program")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    @allure.link("https://app.qase.io/case/NAF-195", name="Qase: NAF-195")
    @allure.description("""
    Test that an admin user can create and edit programs.
    
    Test Steps:
    1. Launch the browser
    2. Login as admin user
    3. Navigate to Programs section
    4. Create a new program with random title
    5. Wait for page to load after program creation
    6. Edit the created program
    7. Verify changes are saved successfully
    """)
    def test_NAF_9_8_0_Edit_Program():
            # Start Playwright synchronously
            with LambdaTestBrowser(test_name="test_9_8_0_Edit_Program") as page:
    
                try:
    
                    # Go to login
                    login_page = LoginPage(page)
                    login_page.loginDev(admin_user, admin_pw)
    
                    # Create a new program
                    programs_page = ProgramsPage(page)
                    programtitle = create_video_title()
                    programs_page.create_program(programtitle)
    
                    # Wait for the page to finish loading after program creation
                    page.wait_for_load_state("networkidle")
    
                    # Edit the created program
>                   programs_page.edit_program(programtitle)
